definitions.definition: Something which reflects heat , light or sound , especially something having a reflecting surface.
A small, often red, reflecting disk on the rear of a vehicle or bicycle that reflects the headlights of other vehicles.
One who reflects on something; one who thinks or considers at length.
Something that is reflective ( indicative ) of something else.
A pattern which can change the direction and/or offset of an oncoming spaceship without being destroyed.

main_definition: Something which reflects heat , light or sound , especially something having a reflecting surface.
secondary_definitions: A small, often red, reflecting disk on the rear of a vehicle or bicycle that reflects the headlights of other vehicles.
One who reflects on something; one who thinks or considers at length.
Something that is reflective ( indicative ) of something else.
( cellular automata ) A pattern which can change the direction and/or offset of an oncoming spaceship without being destroyed.
